title: Billing
lede: Manage your subscription, payment methods, and billing information.

sections.title: Subscription Management
sections.content:
View and manage your iMash subscription and plan details.

Subscription Features:

  • Plan Details: Current plan limits and features
  • Usage Tracking: Monitor monthly usage against limits
  • Plan Upgrades: Upgrade or downgrade subscription plans
  • Billing History: View past invoices and payments

sections.title: Payment Methods
sections.content:
Manage credit cards and payment methods for your account.

  • Payment Cards: Add, remove, and update credit cards
  • Billing Address: Manage billing address information
  • Auto-billing: Configure automatic payment settings
  • Payment History: Track all payment transactions
